## JwtTokenManager class

A class for shared functionality for parsing, storing, and requesting JWT tokens. Intended to be used as a parent to be extended for token request management. Child classes should implement `requestToken()` to retrieve the bearer token from intended sources.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class JwtTokenManager extends TokenManager 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [TokenManager](./ibm-cloud-sdk-core.tokenmanager.md)

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [requestToken()](./ibm-cloud-sdk-core.jwttokenmanager.requesttoken.md) |  | Request a JWT using an API key. |
|  [saveTokenInfo(tokenResponse)](./ibm-cloud-sdk-core.jwttokenmanager.savetokeninfo.md) |  | Save the JWT service response and the calculated expiration time to the object's state. |
